question: It is allowed to masturbate and provide semen at the hospital lab?
answer:
QUESTION

This question is from a male. To test infertility problems, semen sample has to be provided to lab. It is allowed to masturbate and provide semen at the hospital lab as a very short time is available to submit the sample (max 30 mins).

ANSWER
